name: xfreerdp3 - RDP client with dynamic resolution & scaling
description: xfreerdp (FreeRDP) is an open-source RDP client for connecting to Windows Remote Desktop services. These examples demonstrate connecting with credentials, dynamic resolution, desktop scaling, and common options to bypass certificate checks or enable clipboard/drive redirection.

commands.name: Connect to RDP with scaling and dynamic resolution
commands.description: Connect to {TARGET} using provided user credentials, scale the remote desktop to 200% and allow the window to dynamically resize to local resolution changes.

commands.name: Connect ignoring certificate verification and enable clipboard redirection
commands.description: Ignore server certificate validation (useful in lab environments) and enable clipboard sharing between client and remote session.

commands.name: Connect with drive redirection (map local folder) and sound
commands.description: Map local /tmp as a redirected drive named 'payload' and enable sound redirection using ALSA.

commands.name: Connect via gateway (RD Gateway) with TLS
commands.description: Route the RDP connection through an RD Gateway {GATEWAY} on port 443 and use TLS security.
